meanings.sent1: The misadventure left him with a broken arm.
meanings.sent2: She recounted the misadventure to her friends over dinner.
meanings.sent3: The misadventure of slipping on a banana peel was embarrassing but funny.
meanings.sent4: The misadventure of losing his keys felt like a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent5: The misadventure of getting caught in the rain without an umbrella was unforgettable.
meanings.sent6: After the misadventure, they all had a good laugh.
meanings.sent7: Despite the misadventure, they managed to have a great time at the party.

meanings.definition: To have a mishap or misfortune.
meanings.sent1: They misadventure often during their camping trips.
meanings.sent2: I hope we don't misadventure on our road trip.
meanings.sent3: He tends to misadventure whenever he tries to cook.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was misadventuring through life.
meanings.sent5: The team misadventured their way to victory in the end.
